See also: Unser

German[edit]

Alternative forms[edit]

  • Unser (pluralis majestatis)

Etymology[edit]

From Old High German unsēr, from Proto-Germanic *unseraz.

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /ˈʔʊnzɐ/
  • audio
    		(file)

Pronoun[edit]

unser

  1. genitive of wir

Determiner[edit]

unser

  1. our

Inflection[edit]

See also[edit]

  • unserer (without noun)
  • unsere, unseren (with definite article)


Pennsylvania German[edit]

Etymology[edit]

Compare German unser, Dutch onze.

Adjective[edit]

unser

  1. (possessive) our
